lead_paragraph: Stephen Curry and the Golden State Warriors matched one record set by Michael Jordan's Chicago Bulls as they close in on the bigger mark.

headline.print_headline: Warriors Top Thunder for Record-Tying 44th Straight Home Win
headline.main: Warriors Top Thunder for Record-Tying 44th Straight Home Win
